title: Big Monster Sounds Pack Volume 2
description: 101 sound effects (+ 85 with an alternative version, echo added)
longDescription:
Big Monster Voices Volume 2 Pack

After the success of volume 1, we release new 101 sound effects (+ 85 with an alternative version, echo added) divided in:

- Performing attacks (different intensities)

- Receiving attack sounds

- Deaths

- Growls

- Shouts

- Eating

- Breathings

- Footsteps

- Grunts

- Screams

 

YouTube link (hear the audio preview of the 186 SFX)

Soundcloud link (hear the audio preview of the 186 SFX)

Tracklist PDF

 

This pack can be complemented with:

Big Monster Voice Volume 1

Zombie Voices Pack

Orc Voice Pack


[Authors]

- Daydream Sound (contact@daydreamsound.com)

- Audio Alchemist
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Recorded by professional voice actors
  • Intuitive file naming
  • A version of 85 sounds on this pack it's provided with echo (if you are going to use your own echo in-game, don't choose this ones)
  • All you'll ever need regarding monster vocal sounds

Number of Audio Waves: 186

Number of Audio Cues: 186

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some files yes, some no

Minutes of audio provided: 12 minutes and 50 seconds

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1a6PdfADfQT3ak4sWKArdR3XMtLaCDFk7/view
